item.source: How do you make a preson mod or admin

item.title: How do you make a preson mod or admin
item.dc:creator: @doctorwho278 doctorwho278
item.description:
@doctorwho278 wrote:

ok you have got your source if you click on the chararcter folders it will come up with a bunch of names cvlick on the person you want to make mod/pmod and if you want them to be Gold Crown Mod Or silver crown mod here it is

  1. Click On Your Source Folder (e.g pimpscape testscape cheezscape)
    2.Click on characters in that folder.
  2. Pick The person you want to make a mod/pmod
    4.change there character rights to 1 if you want them a pmod (silver crown)
    5.change there character rights to 2 if you want them a mod (gold crown)
    6 change there character rights to 0 if you dont wan them any mod

Thanx Hope You Understand[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 11:10:18 AM[/size][hr]Please Type “yes” If you understand

Plus I will be a mod if theres any space thanx My ingame name is

Admin Doctor[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 11:11:43 AM[/size][hr]P.s Please can you send hamachi details

Read full topic
